title: TTC VIDEO - The Self Under Siege -- Philosophy in the 20th Centu
description:
TTC - Rick Roderick - The Self Under Siege: Philosophy in the 20th Century
The Teaching Company, 1993 - out of print

L01 - The Masters Of Suspicion
L02 - Heidegger And The Rejection Of Humanism
L03 - Sartre And The Roads To Freedom
L04 - Marcuse And One-Dimensional Man
L05 - Habermas And The Fragile Dignity Of Humanity
L06 - Foucault And The Disappearance Of The Human
L07 - Derrida And The Ends Of Man
L08 - Fatal Strategies
Self Under Siege - Guidebook.pdf

VHS rip, XviD 640x432 29.97 fps, mpga 128kb/s 2ch


All thanks and credits go to the kind soul that ripped these lectures and the great person who uploaded them to MegaUpload and posted the links to the What happened to Rick Roderick? webpage at http://larshjo.tihlde.org/roderick/ .
(You can find the links there if you prefer a direct download.)

Enjoy, spread the word, and - please - don't forget to seed ;-) !




Edit / FYI: Lecture 2 has a short dropout section after 33:58 and then out of sync audio for the rest of the file ... the flaw is already in the MegaUpload "original" file, so don't waste time in trying to redownload it.
